text: huramat vaala maheena huramat vaale maheene ke baraabar hai (aur kuchh maheene kee khusoosiyat nahin) sab huramat vaalee cheeje ek doosare ke baraabar hain pas jo shakhs tum par jyaadatee kare to jaisee jyaadatee usane tum par kee hai vaisee hee jyaadatee tum bhee us par karo aur khuda se darate raho aur khoob samajh lo ki khuda parahezagaaron ka saathee hai
